infos.value: Hah, hah, hah...
They're still on my tail...
And it looks like there are more of them!?
Ahh, what am I gonna do?
*Sniff sniff* ...That smell... It's likely attracting them.
Y-you over there!
*Sniff sniff* ...
Wh-what are you doing?
Ahh, that smells so nice. Is that perfume?
You have a good nose. A girl has to be careful about her grooming, doesn't she?
But wait, you came all the way over here just to tell me that?
No, no, no!
Look!
My, that is a lot...
Now I see. You came looking for help.
...Yes.
Worry not.
It would take many more bombs than that to make me break a sweat.
Wow, you're so confident!
Um... I'm Etre, by the way.
Yerma.
Yerma... I wish I was as confident as you.
I wanna get stronger, too...
Do you, now? There is such a thing as becoming too strong, however.
R-really?
You see, I'm traveling to find a man who's stronger than me.
To fight him?
Haha, not exactly.
The only man I could ever fall in love with is one who can best me in battle.
Ahh, I get where you're coming from!
It's just...I've yet to meet any man who has proven to be a match for me at all...
But Etre, what is your motivation?
I'm traveling to become strong enough that I can serve in the Kingdom of Leonis.
The Kingdom of Leonis...?
In Leonis, there's a division called «Fortem». Its commander, Prince Sterne, is immensely strong and handsome to boot.
Handsome, you say?
So, you're trying to get closer to this Prince Sterne?
...Yes.
Strong and handsome! I'd like to meet him myself…
Ah, e-excuse me. It was not my place to intrude upon your love story like that.
No, it's okay. Actually...we should go to Leonis together.
B-but...
Having a rival will make me work all the harder to improve myself. So...
...Are you sure?
Yes! In exchange, help me train and grow stronger while we're on the road to Leonis!
Alright. That shouldn't be too hard.
But first...
We must give our attention to these bombs!
...Right. I'll do my best!
